kpi.name: M5000C425

kpi_info.title: SUM OF ACTIVE DC HSDPA MIMO USERS WITH ONE CARRIER
kpi_info.use: The sum of sampled values for the number of active DC-HSDPA MIMO users. Active DC-HSDPA MIMO users use only one carrier for transmission. This counter, divided by the denominator M5000C327, provides the average number of active DC-HSDPA MIMO users with one carrier. When this counter is updated the counter M5000C329 is updated also. UPDATED: The number of DC-HSDPA MIMO users is sampled with 100 ms period and summed to this counter. Only users which use only one carrier for transmission are counted. The counter is updated only if users receive data in measured cell.

kpi.kpi_alias: SUM OF ACTIVE DC HSDPA MIMO USERS WITH ONE CARRIER
